message:
Guys, we need to settle down a Facebook chat session amung EgyptianGeeks group users.
we need to discuss some of what we can do to make it better, give feedback on what you like to see more, and to really kick-start more activities like a dedicated blog (Mohamed Alaa's original idea), Podcast, etc.

think about it, post here what you think we should talk about, and stay tuned for the update.

data.message:
Thank you Bassam, tell us what you think n order to make the group better.
and tell us more about yourself !!
Woww, I'm In! I Hope this time we really can do something about it :)
Send me Your emails (private message), I will create a Google Docs file that we can discuss our ideas and more important. Make them LIVE :)
